小弟拋磚引玉：
Please Save Hong Kong Imminently!!
On Aug 31,2019 night, Hong Kong people were suffering from extreme violence from HK Police again! After large-scale protests on streets, HK police dispersed protesters and chased them to the trains. Suddenly they went outrageous on the
train platforms and used truncheon to strike on and held guns pointed on innocent citizens. Their behaviours were insane and turned the train into a bloody scene with people's head, even kids' head got banged!

Please see the below link for the video.
